user_instruction: 'Reply to my business partner Mark Thompson'"'"'s email (mark.thompson@gmail.com) with insights for our financial strategy. You can check out my NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Request: Latest Financial Strategy Insights Needed

Hi [Notion Manager’s Name],

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please pull the most recent notes, dashboards, and any supporting analyses on our financial strategy from Notion? I need the key takeaways (forecasts, cost-saving initiatives, and risk considerations) to craft a comprehensive reply to Mark Thompson’s email.

If there are relevant meeting minutes or models stored in the calendar or other shared folders, kindly include those links as well. A concise bullet-point summary by the end of the day would be perfect.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
